name: Wizard Strike
description:
Hello Hero! Welcome to the Wizard Strike! in development currently, but you can test it out fo free (on Windows)

WS is a multiplayer online game. Do you know Counter Strike?) So, that isn't a new one, sorry) That's a battle of wizards with magic spells. 

What spells do I have? 

- you might ask me. Well boy, it's a pretty nice question. 

So, there are 4 spells currently:
  • staff kick
  • fireball
  • heal
  • teleport
And now go and show what you're up to!

P.S. Please note that there is:

  • no menu
  • no sound

But a lot of fun))
